data.title: Ghosted: Savannah’s Haunted Improv Show
data.meta_description: Step into the supernatural world of Savannah's Ghosted Haunted Improv show. Get ready for laughs, chills, and a night you won't forget.
data.text:
The show offers an unforgettable night where Savannah’s ghost stories come alive through improv theater. Prepare to be both spooked and amused as skilled performers bring the city’s haunted past to life before your eyes. Between hilarious laughs and scenes, delve into mystical experiences like Tarot readings and mentalism demonstrations. It’s an immersive journey into the supernatural that promises laughter, chills, and memories that linger long after the show ends.

TICKETS

VIP TABLES

– 2 seats per VIP table (sold separately)

– Complimentary bottle of Champagne per table (or two free drinks per person)

– Tableside service for concessions/drinks
